TITLE: Export Comments - FastComments
HEADING: Export Comments
EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email with a download link when complete. You can view the status of exports below.
REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
NO_EXPORTS: You don't have any pending or past exports.
EXPORT_EXPIRY_NOTE: Note: Exports auto expire after ten days. The data is deleted and the download link will be removed after this time.
